Rabanoid shows all the available trains and buses from the three main locations: Cordoba, Rabanales and Alcolea.

It shows both the train and the bus, if it is a special line and, optionally, it shows the saturday schedule.

Rabanoid. A simple app to check the available transport schedule to the campus of Rabanales in a quick and easy way.

Version 1.0

Programmed by Robert Krovs
